alertGallery.description: Shown when the user clicks the browser action at a Google extension gallery / Web Store page.
alertGallery.message: Extension contents are not allowed on webpages within the Chrome Extensions Gallery / Web Store.

alertUnsupportedPage.description: Shown when the user clicks the browser action on an unsupported page.
alertUnsupportedPage.message: Sorry, the extension is not designed to run in this page.

bookmark_network_error.message: Save bookmark failed. Network error! retry

bookmark_server_error.message: Save bookmark failed. Server error! retry

extDesc.message: Bookmark, Archive, Screenshot & Markup - All-In-One Web Collector, must-have research tool

extName.message: Diigo Web Collector - Capture and Annotate

pageStillLoading.description: Shown when the user clicks the browser action but the page hasn't finished loading

refreshAfterInstallation.description: Tells the user to reload the tab after installing the extension
refreshAfterInstallation.message: The tab is opened before installing the extension. Please reload this page ($reloadShortcut$) and try again.

refreshAfterUpdate.description: Tells the user to reload the tab after an extension update
refreshAfterUpdate.message: The extension "$extName$" has been updated. Please reload this page ($reloadShortcut$) and try again.

share_loadingAnnotatedLink.description: Shown in the Annotated Link tab of the share dialog

upload_error.message: Error uploading page. Please try again later.

upload_uploading.message: Uploading this page to Diigo. You can continue with your browsing.

uploadimage_error.message: Error uploading capture. Please try again later

uploadimage_uploading.message: Uploading... You can continue with your browsing.
